name: C Williams
text: When this location first opened up I loved it. The customer service use to be top notch and the pizzas were always fresh and hot. Now the customer service sucks like the rest of the locations in macon. The pizzas are dry and you're lucky if its not dark and crispy!

name: MIGHTYtheband
text: Pizza at lil Caesars is always fire! This experience was not so fire. The team at this location didn’t have it together at all. Buuuut pizza was still fire! Bless bless

name: Justin Peebles
text: So today my wife goes in to buy some food and the lady behind the counter yells out "what the hell..dont you know we are closing soon?" It is 8:44pm and last time I checked it was open till 10. It used to be worth going in and getting some …More

name: Jeff Tilley
text: Friday night. Phoned ahead for 6 pizzas. They were ready on my arrival. Friendy staff. Cheese and pepperoni pizzas were great. 3 meat pizzas were over cooked, meats were hard. Should have looked at them before I left. Still wish they would put a little more sauce on their pizzas. Overall, good deal.

name: Stephen Morgan
text:
Ordered pizza online at 7pm waited in the lobby for a full hour after talking to the employees twice, and was then told they forgot about the order.
Revised later to 3 stars because the team lead was nice and offered a 2 liter. This location DESPERATELY needs more staff.

name: Caitlin Tidwell
text: I'm not sure what changes they made after moving to this new location, but it is 100% better. From the employee's attitudes all the way to the freshness of the pizza. I have never cared for the hot and ready 5 dollar pizzas, but now that is all we get. I wish i could post a picture of how good this pizza looks!!!!

name: Kirby Willis
text: First time ever using this location and it is by far the worst! Service was iight..yes I said iight!! The pizza was horrible. I asked for an extra most bestest & got the extra most worstest. Asked for a cheese pizza as well and it was the …More

name: Brianna Harker
text: I've called in twice and both times the order wasn't even started before I got there (15 minutes after ordering) the food is good but don't bother calling ahead. You'll still end up waiting. One time the manager was nicest enough to comp me with a crazy bread but it's a rare occasion.

name: Timeka Murphy
text: Went to get pizzas on New Year's Day. Cashier, Shiquita P., was in a very nasty attitude saying, "I'm the only one here, I gotta a lot of online orders to fill and a lot of call-in orders to fill first, so I'll get to you when I can!" She …More

name: Keith Marks JR
text: Never anything ready. Had 3 people working there during lunch hours and they just sat in the back and talked. Never came up to help me or the other 3 customers. Ended up leaving.

name: J.R. Bull
text: This location is a joke of the 10 plus times I've been they have never had hot and readys and multiple times have not had  ingredients to make other pizzas. Also frequently do not answer the phone.

name: Justin Fredericksen
text: Best pizza hands down! Wish they had dine in...

name: S Dru
text: Sorry as hell turn there ringer off on the phone I walked in the store calling there phone I ask for my pizza a certain way and they don't pay attention because there too busy in the back talking about babydababy s and Mama's sorry business on Tom Hill 1/29/2019

name: RIP Black panther Fortnite
text: One star because it was Closed. Sad moment.

name: Mr Mellon
text: I never ate at this particular location but lil ceasars never lets me down! The extra most bestest pizza for the win!

name: Kimberly Evans
text: The last two times we've gotten a pizza from here it has been dried out and hard... seems like it sat in the "warmer" for quiet a few hours.

name: Fankie Rossi
text: Awesome pizza for an awesome price! Always great for a quick cheap meal. Only $5.

name: Jonathan Lucas
text: When they say hot & good it's on point

name: Jon-Laurence deCespedes
text: Even for little Caesars it was meh

name: Carlos Jacinto
text: Don’t bother calling 30 minutes to a hour before closing. They will say they are closed even though they answer the phone with “hello this is little Cesar’s how may I help you”. Needs new employees before they lose a almost daily customer.

name: iLike ChikenSkips
text: I called an order and put an online order and never got my pizza. it never came threw or anything

name: Jim Abu-Staiti
text: Awful pizza ! Its definitely not Italian  !!!

name: Shayla W.
text: The employees are great, the Manager was extremely friendly & the wait wasn't long.

name: Robert English
text: Friendly staff the place is clean worth the prices

name: Rick L.
text: If you want to wait  45 minutes for your  hot and ready  pizza  be my guest

name: Darcie Litton
text: Great price!

name: Defiler Tia
text: Kinda upset i had to drive to here from Gray Highway but atleast i got my pizza. :)

name: theodore smith
text: Been in three times, and not once been able to leave with a pizza.

name: Katherine Jones
text: Friendly staff! Service was quick and the food was delicious.

name: p blu
text: Great food

name: C-O-S -M-O-S
text: Good Pizza ✨

name: Holly White
text: Why is the location closed?

name: Myra Warren
text: Slow

name: Jamie Bacchus
text: Gross

name: Pam Taylor
text: Location is closed

name: Sante Womack
text: Nothing bad to report

name: Brezzy Clara
text: Stuff crust pizza

name: Sean Jermal Sr
text: Excellent People and Service was Fast...
